title: Right-Wing Populist Holds Commanding Lead Ahead of Costa Rica’s Election
summary_full: President Rodrigo Chaves’s handpicked successor has vowed to extend his agenda, which has sought to weaken democratic institutions and crack down on rising violence.
summary_public: President Rodrigo Chaves’s handpicked successor has vowed to extend his agenda, which has sought to weaken democratic institutions and crack down on rising violence.
